name: TOTEM_1
description:
This game was originally part of an installation for an art fair in Los Angeles and in a hotel room in Miami. A plant was hooked up to a computer sending it information that would build a totem and each piece plays a different atmospheric sound

I edited the game so anyone could run it on their Windows gaming machines.

Up arrows increase the totem build speed, down arrows decrease the speed. Esc to quit.

I have not tested this out much on other machines so let me know how it goes if you try it out!
